DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to investigate the prevalence of genetic polymorphisms in adults with iron deficiency and anemia, and the responses to two different treatments: iron sulphate and a composite herbal medicine (Hibiscus sabdariffa plus Centella asiatica). The main outcome will be hemoglobin, measured before and after 6 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Hibiscus Sabdariffa and Centella Asiatica in the Treatment of Anemia by Iron Deficiency
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 y and < 50 y A diagnostic of iron deficient anemia Severe anemia Treatment interruption for more than 25% of the 6 weeks New onset severe adverse symptoms or events Patient's request
